      • createBarChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createBarChart(java.lang.String title,
                                                        java.lang.String valueAxis,
                                                        java.lang.String catAxis,
                                                        org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDataset dataset)
        This method creates a bar chart with only one dataset. It takes a title, a label for the value axis, a label for the category axis and a default category dataset as parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the chart.
        valueAxis - the label for the value axis.
        catAxis - the label for the category axis.
        dataset - the dataset for the bar chart.
        Returns:
        a JFreeChart Bar chart.
        See Also:
        JFreeChart, DefaultCategoryDataset

      • createBarChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createBarChart(java.lang.String title,
                                                        java.lang.String valueAxis,
                                                        java.lang.String catAxis,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDataset> datasets)
        This method creates a bar chart with only one dataset. It takes a title, a label for the value axis, a label for the category axis and an ArrayList of default category datasets as parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the chart.
        valueAxis - the label for the value axis.
        catAxis - the label for the category axis.
        datasets - an ArrayList of datasets for the bar charts.
        Returns:
        a JFreeChart Bar Chart.
        See Also:
        JFreeChart, DefaultCategoryDataset, ChartFactory

      • createBarDataset

        public static org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDataset createBarDataset(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> numbers,
                                                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> names,
                                                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> labels)
        This method creates a dataset for a bar chart. It is used to create the datasets for the different bar chart statistics. It takes an ArrayList of numbers (values), an ArrayList of names (categories) and an ArrayList of labels (label different types of bars on the chart) as parameters. The numbers and names ArrayList need to be the same length and the corresponding data in them must be put in synchronized. So that the first entry in the numbers ArrayList corresponds to the first entry in the names ArrayList, and so on. Labels also needs to be synchronized, first entry in the numbers and names ArrayList gets the first entry in the labels ArrayList as a label, and so on.
        Parameters:
        numbers - an ArrayList of values.
        names - an ArrayList of categories.
        labels - an ArrayList of labels.
        Returns:
        a DefaultCategoryDataset for a bar chart.
        See Also:
        DefaultCategoryDataset

      • createLineChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createLineChart(java.lang.String title,
                                                         java.lang.String valueAxis,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> numbers,
                                                         java.lang.String catAxis,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> names,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> labels)
        This method creates a line chart with only one dataset. It takes a title, a label for the value axis, an ArrayList of numbers (values), a label for the category axis, an ArrayList of names (categories) and an ArrayList of labels as parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - a title for the line chart.
        valueAxis - a label for the value axis.
        numbers - an ArrayList of values.
        catAxis - a label for the label axis.
        names - an ArrayList of categories.
        labels - an ArrayList of labels.
        Returns:
        a JFreeChart line chart.
        See Also:
        JFreeChart, DefaultCategoryDataset

      • createPieChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createPieChart(java.lang.String title,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> names,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> numbers)
        This method creates a pie chart with one dataset. It takes a title, an ArrayList of names and an ArrayList of numbers (values). The numbers and names ArrayList need to be the same length and the corresponding data in them must be put in synchronized. So that the first entry in the numbers ArrayList corresponds to the first entry in the names ArrayList, and so on.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the pie chart.
        names - an ArrayList of names.
        numbers - an ArrayList of numbers.
        Returns:
        a JFreeChart pie chart.
        See Also:
        JFreeChart, DefaultPieDataset, PiePlot, ChartFactory, PieSectionLabelGenerator, StandardPieSectionLabelGenerator
